title: Postal_(DVDScr.2007.Rus).avi
description:
It&#039;s up to you how to judge Postal, I think it is the first good Boll-movie to hit theaters. It&#039;s a black satire of our society and also a firework of gags against good taste. I think it is succesful in it&#039;s attempt both to be a political satire and a tasteless comedy, but it is quite well-known that not everyone shares my opinion, so watch for yourself.
